artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded black and white music sheets with the score on the recto and verso of one sheet and on the recto of the second; from fashion periodical (P.15,633) that includes a folded hand-colored engraving of two women in fashionable period dress (P.15,631-P.15,632)
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Musical score from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Seconde Année, Dix-septième Cahier, 5 Août 1791
